thread.title: This Insane Hillclimb Is Full Of More Utterly Unbelievably Cool Vehicles Than You Can Imagine
thread.title_full: This Insane Hillclimb Is Full Of More Utterly Unbelievably Cool Vehicles Than You Can Imagine

author: Raphael Orlove on Black Flag, shared by Raphael Orlove to Jalopnik
title: This Insane Hillclimb Is Full Of More Utterly Unbelievably Cool Vehicles Than You Can Imagine
text:
Certainly, I can imagine a lot, but when you have Formula cars, drift cars, and home-built race tractors, you’ve really stretched the bounds of my brain. GIF 
Seriously, like every single kind of car a person could be interested in is represented, from a high-revving Honda grip car, to a Peugeot touring car, to a Mitsubishi Evo rally car to Yves Faber’s incredible drift Mustang , with a handful of those bizarre rear-steer race tractors thrown in. Watch a Mustang drift its way up a hill climb Watch a Mustang drift its way up a hill climb Watch a Mustang drift its way up a hill climb Every time you pilot a shopping cart in the supermarket, every time you played with Hot Wheels, you … Read more Read more 
This is the 11th running of the Côte de Holtz hillclimb back in 2010, near the Luxembourg and Belgian borders. I want to go there. I want to race a green monsterchicken. Advertisement
